main event: A 16-year-old girl spotted a dull, red, oval-shaped object in the sky near Mishawaka, Indiana on May 22, 1952.
interesting points: The object remained stationary for about a minute before suddenly climbing up into a cloud bank.
The object made no noise that the observer could hear.
The observer was unable to determine the height or speed of the object.
The weather observer at a nearby airfield reported unusual objects or reflections in the sky that night.
The investigator was skeptical about the authenticity of the sighting due to the possible cloud reflection explanation.
